events.message: I received my new blender yesterday, but it arrived with a broken blade inside the container and doesn't work at all.
The issue has been identified as a product defect due to broken parts reported by the customer.
An agent specializing in product defects has been assigned to handle this case promptly.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the broken blade in your blender. I’m here to help you resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged blender and its packaging so we can assess the damage more accurately?
I have attached the pictures showing the broken blade and scratches on the container. The blender stopped working after one use.
Thank you for the photos. We will send a replacement blender to you immediately, and you can keep the damaged one or return it at your convenience.
That solution sounds great, thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the prompt response.
We have processed your replacement order, and you will receive tracking information shortly. Please reach out if you have any further issues.
Just following up to ensure your replacement blender arrived and is working as expected. Please let us know if you need any more assistance.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing your support case. Thank you for contacting us and have a great day!
